Events that occurred on 25 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Charles Furth.
1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 144.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Rayner Unwin.
1985 - A Path from Rome: An Autobiography, which includes a reminiscence of J.R.R. Tolkien, is published.
1997 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue 10 is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
